        add a customer, while choose an initial account type,
        Parameters:

        address - address of the new customer
        DoB - date of birth of the new customer,
        type - initial account type
        PIN - initial account PIN
        b - initial account balance
        Returns:
        success or not

        add an account for a existed customer
        Parameters:

        type - account type
        PIN - account PIN
        b - initial balance
        ab - account number, if not add by readfile(), it will be Account.count

        success or not
